title: uNDena nambiDuvAi
sahitya:
uNDena nambiDuvAi manamE inda ulagellAm paraviya uyar paramporuLai nI


anupallavi

  toNDaraik-kAttiDum tOnrAt-tuNai aduvAi shollaik-kaDandaduvAi ellArkkumE poduvAi


caraNam    shAnta niraivAm adu dhyAnattil varuvadu shAntam Ananda shaktiyat-taruvadu
kAntattil Usi pOrk-kalandu jIvanil kaNNum kadiroLiyum kATTum arivumAgi
